title: The Holy Creed Which the 150 Holy Fathers Set Forth, Which is Consonant with the Holy and Great Synod of Nice.
author: The Second Ecumenical Council. The First Council of Constantinople

paragraphs.text: The Holy Creed Which the 150 Holy Fathers Set Forth, Which is Consonant with the Holy and Great Synod of Nice.
(Found in all the Collections in the Acts of the Council of Chalcedon.)
